alert.note: Alert for Lincoln (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Child Abduction Emergency issued December 01 at 3:25AM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...AMBER Alert-Single Child... The following message is transmitted at the request of Idaho Office of Emergency Management 1. This is an activation of the AMBER Alert system. The Teton County Sheriff`s Office is looking for a child who was last seen at 4600 Skyline Loop in Victor Idaho and is believed to be in danger. The childs name is Zeke Gregory Best. He is a 10 month old male with unknown hair color and was last seen wearing unknown clothing. Authorities say that the child may be in the company of Jeremy Albert Best and they may be traveling in a black 1995 Chevrolet Tahoe that was last seen possibly heading to Alpine or Jackson Wyoming. If you have any information on the where abouts of this child please contact 9 1 1 immediately.
